column2: pol <- ggplot(data = LRRK2, aes(x = Position, y = Polarity)) + geom_line(size = 0.25) + scale_x_continuous(name = "Amino Acid Number", limits = c(0, 2527), breaks = seq(0, 2527, by = 30)) + theme(aspect.ratio = 0.1) + geom_vline(xintercept = vars$`AA Num`, linetype = "dotted", color = 'red') + geom_point(data = vars, x = vars$`AA Num`, y = vars$Polarity, col = "red" ) + geom_text(data = vars, aes(x = vars$`AA Num`, y = vars$Polarity, label = vars$Variant), nudge_y = -0.25, nudge_x = 3, cex = 2.5, angle = -30, font = 2)  +
